info.title: WikiHow
info.description: Retrieves random out-of-context snippets from WikiHow articles, currently the first sentence of instructional steps and step images. Fun to mix-and-match!

get.description: Gets the src URL for random WikiHow images

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of image URLs to retrieve (maximum 100)

get.description: Gets a random selection of WikiHow steps.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of step strings to retrieve (maximum 100)
